name: Peyton Walters
bio: Hey y'all, I'm Peyton, and I'm currently heading up [infrastructure](https://github.com/pennlabs/infrastructure) for Labs. Outside of Labs, I work part-time for [Bloomberg](https://github.com/bloomberg/) and TA for [CIS 120](https://www.seas.upenn.edu/~cis120/current/). If I'm not doing those things, I'm probably skiing or hiking!
